article_title: Medical flights can deliver big bills to patients
article_text:
Total Access

article_metadata.description: Medical debt weighs on many Americans, but few incidents pack a larger or more-unexpected hit than a medical-helicopter flight. Across the country, patients have been left more financially vulnerable by changes in the air-ambulance industry. In many cases, private insurance companies are scaling back their reimbursement for coverage.
